item.title: Crash Course in Open Targets Part 3: Taming the Data Downloads
item.description: For one whole year I happily hammered away at the APIs, but my queries kept getting bigger and more complex and eventually I wanted to use just about every piece of data that Open Targets provides. The Open Targets team finally told me: “Clare, it’s time to grow up, the APIs aren’t designed for what you’re doing, use the data downloads instead”. I was hesitant - what about the big files, I’ve only got a little laptop!
